name: ProjectElysis
description:
Project Elysis is a topdown, pixelart, action-adventure game that I'm working on by myself. This is a pretty early build of the game and it should take at least a half hour to play through it.

The game has something like 5 areas to explore, over 20 unique monsters to fight, and over 10 weapons to collect, a few of which have upgrades and skills you can learn with them.

Bug reports, and feedback are greatly appreciated on the --->discord<---
